summary: Adds a two-handed Blades Sword to the game. Custom Mesh.
descriptionHtml:
[left][font=Verdana][/font][/left][font=Arial][b]
An extremely simple mod I made for my own use sometime ago, and decided to share it after I didn't find anything else quite like it on the nexus.

[u]What it does;[/u]
It's an ESP that adds three Two-Handed Blades Swords to Skyhaven Temple, with their own custom, texture-replacer compatible mesh. The mesh is set to be about as long as most greatswords in the game and it's a bit faster then other greatswords too (As fast as a one-handed sword) to reflect the thinner, lighter design of Katanas. The Blades sword has had some minor changes too, as it's also a bit faster and with less damage. (about as fast as a dagger). The swords (both one and two handed) have a slightly smaller damage in order to avoid any "cheaty" feeling and compensate for the increased speed. I'm considering adding a dagger as well, for those who don't like swords or want something more suitable for their sneaky characters but still want to show some Blades pride. If enough interest is shown, I'll probably add it later.

[u]Where to find them;[/u]
Exactly where you find the other Blades Swords. There are normally six swords on Display in Skyhaven Temple, in a room off to the side. This just replaces three of them with greatswords. [/b][/font]


[u][b]Install Instructions[/b][/u];
[b]NMM, or drag and drop into your data folder.

[u]Note;
[/u]It turns out I'm crap at taking screenshots, so thanks to TrueRevan for theirs. Greatly appreciated....
It also turns out I'm unlikely to update this mod, as there really isn't much else to do with it. It does exactly what I intended it to do, and there's really not much that I can add to it aside from maybe a dagger or something, but I'm not going to add that unless someone actually WANTS it...So this mod can be considered complete..[/b]
author: MissQuinn
